ghclass 0.1.0

Add files to a repo

add_files.Rd

add_files uses the GitHub api to add/update files in an existing repo on GitHub.

add_files(repo, message, files, branch = "master", preserve_path = FALSE,
  verbose = TRUE)

Arguments

repo

repo names in the form of owner/name.
message

commit message.
files

local file paths of files to be added.
branch

name of branch to use, defaults to master.
preserve_path

should the local relative path be preserved.
verbose

display verbose output.

Examples

# NOT RUN {
add_files("rundel/ghclass", "Update DESCRIPTION", "./DESCRIPTION")
# }

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Examples
